name: WonderRush
description:
Architecture: Multiplayer game with two-players rooms. Client aplication for Android mobile phones is developed in Unity Engine, server is built with Python on cloud.

 Assets (graphics, SFX): All the assets were self-designed, drawn and developed by us during the gamejam. Third party font Modern Society was also used in this project. We developed shaders to create additional visual effects during the gameplay.

Business model: More rooms could be a start to creating a metaverse. The more rooms, the more people can play, the more possible skins to sell. It is also a project with the server designed to be hosted on cloud, so it's easy to scale up.
